sourcesContent:
import { useState } from 'react'; import { useAuth } from '../context/AuthContext'; import { useNavigate } from 'react-router-dom'; export default function Register() { const [formData, setFormData] = useState({ name: '', email: '', password: '', role: 'staff' }); const { register, error } = useAuth(); const navigate = useNavigate(); const { name, email, password, role } = formData; const onChange = (e) => { setFormData((prevState) => ({ ...prevState, [e.target.name]: e.target.value, })); }; const onSubmit = async (e) => { e.preventDefault(); try { await register({ name, email, password, role }); } catch (err) { console.error(err); } }; return (

); }
